channel.title: Formal Methods & Industry
channel.description: Recent content on Formal Methods & Industry

item.title: About
item.description: This website has been created as part of a directive from the FME (Formal Methods Europe) commitee: http://www.fmeurope.org to establish an FME Industry committee in support for infusion of formal methods into industry. The FME Industry committee consists of the following individuals, whom provide input to what is contained on this website: Nikolaj Bjorner, Microsoft Research, USA Alessandro Cimatti, FBK Trento, Italy Rance Cleaveland, Maryland University, USA Jan Friso Groote, Eindhoven University, The Netherlands John Hatcliff, Kansas State University, USA Klaus Havelund, Jet Propulsion Laboratory/NASA, USA (chair) Gerwin Klein, University of NewSouth Wales, Australia Thierry Lecompte, ClearSy, France Colin Oâ€™Halloran, D-RisQ Ltd.
